extDesc.message: For Google™ Authenticator. Click edit button and add button, then drag mouse to select QR code area to add new account.

errorsecret.message: Secret Error. Only Base32(A-Z, 2-7 and =) and HEX(0-9 and A-F) are supported. However, your secret is:
